Display.Size: 1.9 inches, 30 x 37 mm, 11.4 cm2 (~24.6% screen-to-body ratio)

Memory.Card slot: Memory Stick Micro (M2), up to 2 GB

Sound.Alert types: Vibration; Downloadable polyphonic, MP3, AAC ringtones, composer

Features.Messaging: SMS, EMS, MMS, Email, Instant Messaging
Features.\u00a0:
MP3/AAC/AAC+/eAAC+ player
Video telephony
Predictive text input
Photo editor
Organizer
Voice memo

Battery.Stand-by: Up to 350 h (2G) / Up to 350 h (3G)
Battery.Talk time: Up to 7 h (2G) / Up to 2 h 30 min (3G)
